definition: Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: That is what he did over his Christmas vacation, wave mechanics.
sentences.chinese: 這就是他在他聖誕節假期所做的，波動力學。

sentences.english: Almost overnight, the field of wave mechanics was born.
sentences.chinese: 幾乎是在一夜之間，波動力學這個學科就誕生了。

sentences.english: That is what I did. Wave mechanics.
sentences.chinese: 這就是我做的，波動力學。
